string.name: media_location_permission
string.value: Used for memo access to geographic location information in user media files

string.name: distributed_dataSync_permission
string.value: Used for memo data exchange between different equipment

string.name: read_image_video_permission
string.value: Used to read images or video files from the user's public directory

string.name: write_image_video_permission
string.value: Used to modify image or video files in the user's public directory
